components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
I use studio on 2 different laptops (home and work). I have to login to studio every time I switch between laptops, which is annoying. But every time I do, on either laptop, Studio stops responding after I login.  Here are the steps I have to take every time:

# Launch Studio
# Prompted 3 times to login
# Studio loads, but hangs (see screenshot)
# Force quit Studio
# Re-launch studio
# Works as expected

I have attached a screen shot of the frozen studio, the studio log file and the crash log that Apple asks me to submit.
fields.summary: Studio always freezes when logging in
fields.environment:
Mac OS X 10.12.2
Appcelerator Studio 4.8.1 (affected versions above doesn't list this version)

comments.body:
Hello, First open Terminal and run "appc logout -D"
Now, "appc login" provide login credential and follow through. After the login is successful open studio see if the hangs happen or not. Thanks.

That seems to have fixed the issue. I ran your commands and was prompted to validate each laptop via SMS.  After doing that, I closed and relaunched Studio several times on each laptop and it worked without hanging or prompting for login again.  Thank you.
